title: Challenge - Font Type
content:
Ok, I have not been able to figure out the font for "ENTERTAINMENT" here.

Can anyone figure out what the font is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131837im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5fb9cd_aefbc9cd70f74d3d9cc9bc1f34b88fe4_5665.jpg_srz_p_600_235_75_22_0.50_1.20_0.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131837im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5fb9cd_aefbc9cd70f74d3d9cc9bc1f34b88fe4_4351.jpg_srz_p_600_235_75_22_0.50_1.20_0.png)

Thanks,

Eric
author: Lightswitch

comments.content: Also, does anyone know what the font for "Everything" and "Restaurant & Lounge" is?

"ENTERTAINMENT" is **[ITC Kabel (Ultra Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131837/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=ITCKabel%20-%20Ultra&fid=1a157e1492a4ee15ff2b57e33348e59f&fsize=60&text=ENTERTAINMENT&wrap=2)**

"Everything" is **[Script MT (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131837/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Script%20MT%20Std%20-%20Bold&fid=5f6ee60cd6f9454d777f19a296f99187&fsize=60&text=Everything&fit=1)** by Monotype
Entertainment looks like someone may have pseudo-condensed ITC Kabel Black/Ultra

"RESTAURANT & LOUNGE" must be a manually slanted/condensed **[Arial Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131837/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Mac-OS-Fonts%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Arial%20Black%20-%20Regular&fid=6bf138c2ed58678adad157e7bbdae830&fsize=60&text=RESTAURANT%20%26%20LOUNGE&wrap=2)**
